game.title: Quest for the Golden Apple
game.objective: Find the Golden Apple and bring it to the king
game.description: Find the Golden Apple in the forest and bring it to the king. He will reward you with a bag of gold and a magical cloak that will make you invisible.
game.reward: 100 gold coins and a magical cloak

task.objective: Find the Golden Apple in the forest
task.description: Search for the elusive Golden Apple hidden deep within the forest.

task.objective: Bring the Golden Apple to the king
task.description: Present the Golden Apple to King, ensuring it is not damaged in transport.
